Uses of Class
javax.ws.rs.core.UriBuilder

  • Packages that use UriBuilder 
    Package Description
    javax.ws.rs.client
    The Client API
    javax.ws.rs.core
    Low-level interfaces and annotations used to create RESTful service resources.
    javax.ws.rs.ext
    APIs that provide extensions to the types supported by the API.
